create table bill_of_materials (
        quantity integer not null,
        id_bom bigint not null auto_increment,
        material_id bigint not null,
        product_id bigint not null,
        primary key (id_bom)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table customers (
        id_customer bigint not null auto_increment,
        address varchar(255) not null,
        city varchar(255) not null,
        name varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id_customer)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table deliveries (
        cost float(53),
        delivery_date date,
        id_delivery bigint not null auto_increment,
        order_id bigint not null,
        driver varchar(255),
        vehicle varchar(255),
        status enum ('EN_COURS','LIVREE','PLANIFIEE') not null,
        primary key (id_delivery)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table orders (
        quantity integer not null,
        customer_id bigint not null,
        id_order bigint not null auto_increment,
        product_id bigint not null,
        status enum ('EN_PREPARATION','EN_ROUTE','LIVREE') not null,
        primary key (id_order)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table production_orders (
        end_date date,
        quantity integer not null,
        start_date date,
        id_order bigint not null auto_increment,
        product_id bigint not null,
        status enum ('BLOQUE','EN_ATTENTE','EN_PRODUCTION','TERMINE') not null,
        primary key (id_order)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table products (
        cost float(53) not null,
        production_time integer not null,
        stock integer not null,
        id_product bigint not null auto_increment,
        name varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id_product)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table raw_material_suppliers (
        raw_material_id bigint not null,
        supplier_id bigint not null
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table raw_materials (
        stock integer not null,
        stock_min integer not null,
        id_material bigint not null auto_increment,
        name varchar(255) not null,
        unit varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id_material)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table refresh_tokens (
        revoked bit not null,
        created_at datetime(6) not null,
        expiry_date datetime(6) not null,
        id bigint not null auto_increment,
        user_id bigint not null,
        token varchar(500) not null,
        primary key (id)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table suppliers (
        lead_time integer,
        rating float(53),
        id_supplier bigint not null auto_increment,
        contact varchar(255),
        name varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id_supplier)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table supply_order_materials (
        quantity integer not null,
        id bigint not null auto_increment,
        raw_material_id bigint not null,
        supply_order_id bigint not null,
        primary key (id)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table supply_orders (
        order_date date not null,
        id_order bigint not null auto_increment,
        supplier_id bigint not null,
        status enum ('EN_ATTENTE','EN_COURS','RECUE') not null,
        primary key (id_order)
    ) engine=InnoDB

create table users (
        id_user bigint not null auto_increment,
        email varchar(255) not null,
        first_name varchar(255) not null,
        last_name varchar(255) not null,
        password varchar(255) not null,
        role enum ('ADMIN','CHEF_PRODUCTION','GESTIONNAIRE_APPROVISIONNEMENT','GESTIONNAIRE_COMMERCIAL','PLANIFICATEUR','RESPONSABLE_ACHATS','RESPONSABLE_LOGISTIQUE','SUPERVISEUR_LIVRAISONS','SUPERVISEUR_LOGISTIQUE','SUPERVISEUR_PRODUCTION') not null,
        primary key (id_user)
    ) engine=InnoDB
